column1: Take time to break old habits and contribute to those around you in a positive way.
Take this time to create healthy alliances with those around you that can help while removing any negative energy that may be holding you back.
You are ending a project and finally receiving recognition for your hard work. Take joy of your success.
Let go of what is holding you back. Seek something new and exciting. Do not let fear control your life.

column1: You are in the midst of learning new things. Take advantage of your newfound knowledge to improve yourself.
Take thought of your future plans. Do not use lose focus of these goals despite the many new ideas presenting themselves at this time.
Your self confidence is peaking. Bask in your feelings of generosity and happiness that are overflowing within your home life.
Take time for inner reflection. Contemplate making new changes for the better.
You have been feeling great creativity

column1: New love will present itself this month. This is the time to jump into new projects and relationships that excite you.

column1: Make plans for your future. Focus on your communication with others.

You have been seeking excitement and mental stimulation to break the cycle of boredom. Take faith
